review: Wish the Fire TV Stick had a better range than it does.  Doesn't work unless it is less than 10 feet from my router.
author: Elliot J. Saatzer

review: Easy set up and connectivity through WI-FI.  Works just like the Fire-TV (which I have and use daily for seamless streaming  movies from Prime and Netflix) but with fewer options through the remote.  Would recommend.  Just make sure there is an outlet near by as it has to be plugged in for its power source.
author: fool4fish "radmathman"

review: Easy to set up, fairly easy to navigate. Once they add HBOGO, it will be 5 stars!
author: Amazon Customer "m-e-p"

review: Received it today. Plugged it in and it does not work. Hangs on the network screen. You would have thought that the product team did a better job testing it out. From the numerous reviews here it appears they did not. I'm sure it will work fine when I can finally get it to work.
author: Leo

review: Waiting a month to get it was unexpected. Worth the 20 I paid. Nothing special about device.
author: Phillip Noonkester

review: Only gives you a little to watchyour choices are very limited
author: Len Hedrick

review: I love it, no comparison to the chromecast
author: Andre Burnett Jr. "Dré"
